T02TD1325E:271a-1: a'arya badzra t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD1325E:271a-3: 'phags ma rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1325E:271a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1325E:271a-5: phun sum tshogs kun skyed byed pa'i //
T02TD1325E:271a-6: sgrol ma la btud gus pas de //
T02TD1325E:271a-7: man ngag bzhin du bsdus nas su //
T02TD1325E:271a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02TD1325E:271a-9: thog mar re zhig rnal 'byor pas dri zhim po'i me tog la sogs pa thogs te /
T02TD1325E:271a-10: yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang par rab tu zhugs te /
T02TD1325E:271a-11: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas skyil krung bcas te /
T02TD1325E:271a-12: sna la blta zhing lte ba'i rtsa ba la sems rtse gcig tu bya zhing /
T02TD1325E:271a-13: rang gi snying gar aom yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge t'am ser po yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje la gnas pa'i t'am yig bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:271a-14: de las 'od zer dra ba lcags kyu lta bu spros pas 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mdun gyi nam mkhar rnam par bltas te /
T02TD1325E:271a-15: de nas rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i me tog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la mchod yon phul la mchod par bsams te /
T02TD1325E:271a-16: aom a'a: badzra pushpe tam badzra t'a re badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271a-17: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom ratna sam bha ba badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271a-19: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom badzra pushpa t'a re badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271a-20: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom bee ro tsa na pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271a-22: aom a'a: badzra pushpe ta dh'u pa t'a re badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-1: aaksho bhya badzra pushpe dza pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-3: aom a'a: badzra pushpe re d'i pa t'a re badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-4: aom a'a: badzra pushpe hri: aa mi t'a bh'a badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-6: aom a'a: badzra pushpe ru gandha t'a re badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-7: aom a'a: badzra pushpe kham aa mo gha siddhe /
T02TD1325E:271b-8: badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-10: aom a'a: badzra pushpe ta badzr'am ku shi badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-11: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom bee ro tsa na badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-12: dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis pa'i shar du'o //
T02TD1325E:271b-13: aom a'a: badzra pushpe re badzra p'a shi badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-14: aom a'a: badzra pushe h'um aakshobhya badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-16: aom a'a: badzra pushpe tu badzra spho ta badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-17: aom a'a: badzra pushpe hr'i: aa mi t'a bh'a badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-19: aom a'a: badzra pushpe re badzra ghande badzra pushpam pra t'itstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-20: aom a'a: badzra pushpe kham aa mo gha siddhe badzra pushpm pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-22: aom a'a: badzra pushpa sarba aushn'i sha bi dza ye badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-23: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom ratna sam bha ba badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-25: aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'a sum bha badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-26: aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'um aa kasho bhya badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-28: aom a'a: badzra pushpe gha bo dhi tsitta gha ta badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-29: aom a'a: badzra pushpe h'um aa ksho bhya badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-31: aom a'a: pushpe pum su me ro badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-32: aom a'a: badzra pushpe aom bee ro tsa na badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-35: bahni kunda badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-36: aom a'a: badzra pushpe hr'i: aa mi t'a bh'a badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-38: aom a'a: badzra pushpe dhvam ma h'a dhva dza pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-39: aom a'a: badzra pushpe kham aa mo gha siddhe badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:271b-41: gong bzhin du bdug spos dang mar me dang lha bshos la sogs pa nye bar bshams te /
T02TD1325E:271b-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'khor lo'i mdun phyogs tsam du phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD1325E:271b-44: phyis mi byed par dam bca' ba dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-1: la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-3: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-4: lam rgyud la bsten pa dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-6: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-7: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i yan lag bdun pa bya ba'i tshig ni /
T02TD1325E:272a-8: rnam rtog ma lus nub pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i //
T02TD1325E:272a-9: rtag tu srid zhi mnyam nyid lta ldan pa'i //
T02TD1325E:272a-10: bde ba dpe med ro ni shar ba yi //
T02TD1325E:272a-11: rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1325E:272a-12: thog ma med pa'i dus nas yang yang 'khor bar skyes par gyur cing //
T02TD1325E:272a-13: gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der sdig pa gang zhig bgyis pa'i las thams cad so sor bshags so //
T02TD1325E:272a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma'i mdun du yang phyis mi byed par dam bca' ba'i ched du /
T02TD1325E:272a-15: bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de dag thams cad bshags par byas pas /
T02TD1325E:272a-16: de byang chub chen po'i bar du phyis mi byed par bgyi'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-17: phyis mi byed par dam bca'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-19: skye ba thog ma med pa nas sems can kun gyis gang bsod nams bgyis pa dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-21: rjes su yi rang ba la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD1325E:272a-22: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes bsngo ba'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-23: 'di ni bdag byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-24: theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-25: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-28: bdag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni /
T02TD1325E:272a-29: sems can thams cad kyi don du phan pa dang /
T02TD1325E:272a-30: ji srid du mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1325E:272a-31: de srid du byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD1325E:272a-32: bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rdo rngo rdze theg pa'i lam bsten par bgyi'o //
T02TD1325E:272a-33: sems can gyi don du lam rgyud la bsten pa'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-0: de nas @272b bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sgrol ma la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-2: thugs rje chen po de dag gis dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdag la byin gyis rlob cing yongs su skyong ba dang grub pa'i mchog bdag la stsol bar gyur cig ces gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD1325E:272b-3: srid zhi mnyam nyid la chags kun rtog rlabs //
T02TD1325E:272b-4: dngos kun ma lus mkha' ltar gzigs gyur pa'i //
T02TD1325E:272b-5: brtse ba'i chu yis rab rgyas thugs ni rgya mtsho'i mchog / lha mo rnams kyis bdag la brtse bar mdzad par zhu zhu ba'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-7: bdag ni bsod nams mi ldan bkren chen te //
T02TD1325E:272b-8: bdag la mchod pa'i yo byad gzhan gang med //
T02TD1325E:272b-9: de phyir bdag don gzhan don sems rnams ni //
T02TD1325E:272b-10: mgon pos 'di ni bdag la gzung du gsol //
T02TD1325E:272b-11: zhes 'di ni bzod par gsol ba'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-12: de nas aom na ma: a'ar+ya' ba lo ki te /
T02TD1325E:272b-14: bo dhi satv'a ya ma h'a satv'a ya /
T02TD1325E:272b-15: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1325E:272b-20: sarba satv'artha k'a ru ni ke sh'i ghram gatstsha /
T02TD1325E:272b-21: de ba tv'a bhu pa nam /
T02TD1325E:272b-22: a'ar+ya' ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1325E:272b-24: ma nu sm'a ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:272b-25: zhes pa 'dis snyim pa me tog gis bkang pa phul la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD1325E:272b-26: de'i rjes la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom ste /
T02TD1325E:272b-27: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar chags pa ni byams pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1325E:272b-28: ngan song gi mtshan nyid rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du lhung ba'i sems can rnams mthong nas bdag gi grogs po rnams yin par shes nas sdug bsngal can rnams bsgral te zhes pa ni snying rje'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-29: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems chen po bskyed de 'di ltar bdag gis sgrol ma'i gzugs thob par byas la /
T02TD1325E:272b-30: sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par bgyi snyam pa ni dga' ba'o //
T02TD1325E:272b-31: bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'i ye shes byed par mi nus pas /
T02TD1325E:272b-32: de bas na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du rnyed pa dang /
T02TD1325E:273a-0: sdug bsngal la sogs pa dngos po rnams la ma chags par gyur pas ji @273a * //
T02TD1325E:273a-1: ltar 'dod pa'i don mngon par bsgrub pa ni btang snyoms so //
T02TD1325E:273a-2: de nas chos thams cad kyang yid kyis dmigs pa rnam par dpyad de /
T02TD1325E:273a-3: 'di ni bdag gi sems kho na nyid kyi rnam pa dang des de 'khrul pas so sor snang ste rmi lam ji bzhin no //
T02TD1325E:273a-4: sems las tha dad sems kyi gzung ba med pas 'dzin pa yang med do //
T02TD1325E:273a-5: de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin gyi chos rnams so //
T02TD1325E:273a-6: de dag gi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba 'di dag rnams stong pa nyid don dam yin la /
T02TD1325E:273a-7: 'di ltar mtha' gcig pas shin tu brten pa 'khrul pas kun tu gzhag pa rang 'khrul pa'i rtags chos thams cad kyi rnam pa spangs te /
T02TD1325E:273a-8: de dag gi rang bzhin stong pa kho na 'ba' zhig sems nyid gnyis med kyi mtshan nyid shel ltar dag pa dang gsal ba dri ma med pa ston ka'i nam mkha' phyed pa lta bu mtha' yas par dmigs te /
T02TD1325E:273a-9: 'di ltar don dam byang chub kyi sems dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i stong nyid kyi ye shes spros pa med pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD1325E:273a-10: de nas 'di la sngags kyi byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02TD1325E:273a-11: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1325E:273a-12: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1325E:273a-13: bdag dang gzhan gyi stong pa nyid la lhag par mos te de kho na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02TD1325E:273a-14: de kho na srung ba'i mchog go //
T02TD1325E:273a-15: de nas de dang mthun pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten dag pa'i rang bzhin bsrung ba chos 'byung ye shes kyi rjes su dran pas bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1325E:273a-16: stong pa nyid kyi dang las ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02TD1325E:273a-17: de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i 'dod pa ji lta bas rgyas par shin tu 'bar ba rdo rje'i ra ba rgya gram gru bzhi pa /
T02TD1325E:273a-18: de'i steng du 'od zer des sprul pa'i rdo rje'i gur dang de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi sa 'og gi bar du blta bar bya ste /
T02TD1325E:273a-19: de nas nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis 'od zer du gyur pas phyogs dang phyogs la spros la gcig tu gyur pas phyi rol du mtshams bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD1325E:273a-20: de'i 'od zer gyis bgegs bskrad nas /
T02TD1325E:273a-21: aom me di n'i badzra'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02TD1325E:273a-22: aom badzra pr'a ka ra h'um pam h'um /
T02TD1325E:273a-23: aom badzra panydza ra h'um yam h'um /
T02TD1325E:273b-0: aom badzra bit'a na @273b h'um kham h'um /
T02TD1325E:273b-1: aom badzra sha ra j'a la tr'am sham tr'am /
T02TD1325E:273b-2: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD1325E:273b-3: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su 'byung ba chen po nam mkha'i rang bzhin /
T02TD1325E:273b-4: chos 'byung rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba 'og tu phra ba steng du rgyas pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-5: ae'i rnam pa can gyi nang du nam mkha'i gzugs nang du bcug pa can /
T02TD1325E:273b-6: 'od zer gyi khyams dang ldan par bsgom te /
T02TD1325E:273b-7: de'i dbus su nam mkha'i rang bzhin can /
T02TD1325E:273b-8: sna tshogs padma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i rdo rje rgya gram rgyas pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-9: de'i dkyil du khyab par byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnams lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin te gong dang gang du blta'o //
T02TD1325E:273b-10: de la dang por yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu rtse mo gnyis la g-yo ba'i ba dan can no //
T02TD1325E:273b-11: de'i steng du ram yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po ram yig gis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1325E:273b-12: de'i steng du bam yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar la zlum pa bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1325E:273b-13: de'i steng du lam yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa zur la rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02TD1325E:273b-14: de'i steng du bhr'um dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bus khyab nas gnas pa thams cad khyab par byed par shes nas /
T02TD1325E:273b-15: rdo rje rgya gram gyi dbus su sems 'byung ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsdus pa rang bzhin thar pa'i sgo chen po lta bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin can /
T02TD1325E:273b-16: rin chen sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa ka brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-17: 'dod yon gyi snam bu bzhi dang ldan pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-18: rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-19: dra ba phyed dang ldan pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-23: dril bu la sogs pas brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1325E:273b-24: 'dod yon mchog gis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02TD1325E:273b-25: dga' byed rim pa gnyis pa dang //
T02TD1325E:273b-26: ze 'bru gcig par gyur pa dang //
T02TD1325E:273b-27: zur gsum gyis ni gzhan nyid dran //
T02TD1325E:273b-28: rim pa'i dbus su padma yin //
T02TD1325E:274a-1: steng du dbyangs yig bco lnga gyur pa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1325E:274a-2: de'i steng du gsal byed sum cu rtsa bzhi yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1325E:274a-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1325E:274a-4: de'i dbus su t'am las byung ba'i gser gyi mdog lta bu'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa'i lte ba la sa bon gyis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can du bsgoms te /
T02TD1325E:274a-5: sa bon de las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'khor lo'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spros la sems can gyi don byas te /
T02TD1325E:274a-6: de dag dang lhan cig tu byas pa bkug nas sa bon dang phyag mtshan la thim par bsam pa ni bya ba grub pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1325E:274a-7: de nas zla ba dang nyi ma dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1325E:274a-8: zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1325E:274a-9: gser lta bu'i mdog can ma shin tu mdzes ma /
T02TD1325E:274a-10: gzhon nu ma'i lha'i mtshan nyid kyis 'bar zhing sangs rgyas bzhi'i cod pan can /
T02TD1325E:274a-11: nyi ma'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i lang tsho la bab pa /
T02TD1325E:274a-12: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba can //
T02TD1325E:274a-13: sna tshogs padma la gnas pa /
T02TD1325E:274a-14: 'od zer dmar po'i rgyab yol can //
T02TD1325E:274a-18: dung dkar po rnams ni phyag g-yas na'o //
T02TD1325E:274a-19: de bzhin du g-yon pa rnams kyis autpala ser po dang /
T02TD1325E:274a-23: rdo rje skyil krung rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1325E:274a-24: srid pa gsum ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1325E:274a-25: dang po'i zhal ni gser mdog ste //
T02TD1325E:274a-26: g-yas pa dkar po kho na'o //
T02TD1325E:274a-27: byang gi zhal ni dmar po ste //
T02TD1325E:274a-28: nub kyi sngon po kho na nyid //
T02TD1325E:274a-29: dkyil 'khor bdag po'i zhal nas su //
T02TD1325E:274a-30: snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02TD1325E:274a-31: sngags las byung ba'i lha mo bcu //
T02TD1325E:274a-32: sa bon dbye bas spros pa ni //
T02TD1325E:274a-33: aom t'a re tu tt'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:274a-34: shar gyi la sogs pa phyogs kyi padma'i 'dab ma rnams la ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i aom t'a re tu ta yig gnas so //
T02TD1325E:274b-0: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor @274b la gnas pa'i t'a re tu re'i yi ge rnams so //
T02TD1325E:274b-1: steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge sv'o //
T02TD1325E:274b-2: 'og tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'o //
T02TD1325E:274b-3: sa bon de dag yongs su gyur pa las sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan rnams bsgoms te /
T02TD1325E:274b-4: de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba byas la /
T02TD1325E:274b-5: de'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las lha mo rnams so //
T02TD1325E:274b-6: sa bcu po yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1325E:274b-7: lha mo bcur ni yongs shes bya //
T02TD1325E:274b-8: rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1325E:274b-9: zhal gcig phyag gnyis de rnams su //
T02TD1325E:274b-10: shar du zla ba gnas pa yi //
T02TD1325E:274b-11: yid du 'ong ba sku mdog dkar //
T02TD1325E:274b-12: me tog phyag dang ldan pa yin //
T02TD1325E:274b-13: aom las byung ba'i sgrol ma bsgom //
T02TD1325E:274b-14: de bzhin rnam snang cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:274b-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:274b-17: lho ru spos kyi sgrol ma ni //
T02TD1325E:274b-18: t'a las byung ba sku mdog gnag / spos phor phyag na 'dzin pa la //
T02TD1325E:274b-19: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1325E:274b-20: de bzhin mi bskyod cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:274b-21: nam mkha'i khams dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:274b-22: nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02TD1325E:274b-23: sku mdog dmar mo rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD1325E:274b-24: mar me'i gong bu 'dzin pa ni //
T02TD1325E:274b-25: zla bar gnas pa re las byung //
T02TD1325E:274b-26: de bzhin mtha' yas cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:274b-27: me'i khams dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:274b-28: de bzhin byang du zla bar gnas //
T02TD1325E:274b-29: tu yig las byung dri sgrol ma //
T02TD1325E:274b-30: dri chab dung phor phyag na 'phyar //
T02TD1325E:274b-31: sku mdog sngon mo rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1325E:274b-32: de bzhin don grub cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:274b-33: rlung gi khams dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:274b-34: mi bskyod la sogs rab dbye bas //
T02TD1325E:274b-35: mtshams kyi 'dab mar phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD1325E:274b-37: ral gri de bzhin kha dog dbye //
T02TD1325E:274b-38: de nas sgo skyong ma rnams bsgom //
T02TD1325E:274b-39: lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas //
T02TD1325E:274b-40: shar sgo'i phyogs kyi rim pa yis //
T02TD1325E:274b-41: nyi mar gnas pa rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1325E:274b-42: lcags kyu dkar mo shar sgo ru //
T02TD1325E:274b-43: sa bon t'a las byung ba ni //
T02TD1325E:274b-44: g-yas pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD1325E:275a-2: de bzhin rnam snang cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-3: sa'i khams dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-4: lho ru zhags pa sku mdog ser //
T02TD1325E:275a-5: sa bon re las byung ba yin //
T02TD1325E:275a-6: zhags pa sdigs mdzub bcas pa'i phyag //
T02TD1325E:275a-7: dkyil 'khor dmar po kun du bstan //
T02TD1325E:275a-8: de bzhin mi bskyod cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-9: nam mkha'i khams dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-10: nub tu dmar mo lcags sgrog ma //
T02TD1325E:275a-11: sa bon tu yig las byung ba'i //
T02TD1325E:275a-12: lcags sgrog sdigs mdzub bcas pa'i phyag //
T02TD1325E:275a-13: rdo rje dkyil 'khor kun du gnas //
T02TD1325E:275a-14: de bzhin mtha' yas cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-15: me'i khams dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-16: byang du dril bu ljang gu ma'o //
T02TD1325E:275a-17: sa bon re las byung ba yis //
T02TD1325E:275a-18: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag dang ldan //
T02TD1325E:275a-19: g-yon du sdigs mdzub 'od la gnas //
T02TD1325E:275a-20: de bzhin don yod cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-21: rlung gi khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-22: zur gyi cha la phyag mtshan rnams //
T02TD1325E:275a-23: bdag mal sogs rnam dag pas //
T02TD1325E:275a-24: byang sems bur ring ba dang //
T02TD1325E:275a-25: me thab dang ni rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02TD1325E:275a-26: steng du gtsug gtor rnam rgyal ma //
T02TD1325E:275a-27: nyi mar gnas pa sv'a las byung //
T02TD1325E:275a-29: g-yon pas sdang la sdigs mdzub mdzad //
T02TD1325E:275a-30: de bzhin rin 'byung cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-31: chu'i khams dang stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-32: nyi mar gnas pa h'a las byung //
T02TD1325E:275a-33: klu zhags 'dzin pa sku mdog sngo //
T02TD1325E:275a-34: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub 'jigs byed pa //
T02TD1325E:275a-35: gnod mdzes ma ni 'og tu bsgom //
T02TD1325E:275a-36: de bzhin mi bskyod cod pan can //
T02TD1325E:275a-37: nam mkha'i khams dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02TD1325E:275a-38: de ltar dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par blta ste //
T02TD1325E:275a-39: thams cad mig la sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD1325E:275a-40: mig tu gti mug rdo rje bskyed //
T02TD1325E:275a-41: zhe sdang rdo rje snyan gnyis la //
T02TD1325E:275a-42: de bzhin sna la ser sna ma //
T02TD1325E:275a-43: kha ru 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02TD1325E:275a-44: phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1325E:275a-45: nyon mongs kun gyi mun sel ma //
T02TD1325E:275b-0: skye mched la ni rnam par @275b shes //
T02TD1325E:275b-1: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1325E:275b-2: zhes pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rjes la sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya ste //
T02TD1325E:275b-3: aom yig gis sku byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1325E:275b-4: a'a: yig gis gsung byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02TD1325E:275b-5: h'um yig gis thugs byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:275b-6: de nas lha mo kun gyi snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang rang gi sa bon blta ste /
T02TD1325E:275b-7: de nas rang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs kyi sgrol ma mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs la /
T02TD1325E:275b-8: sngar bzhin du aa rgha la sogs pa phul nas //
T02TD1325E:275b-9: me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams spros pas de rnams kyi phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod de /
T02TD1325E:275b-10: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1325E:275b-11: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgo skyong gi rnal 'byor gyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du aom badzra aam ku shi a'a karsha ya dza: aom badzra p'a she a'a be sha ya h'um //
T02TD1325E:275b-12: aom badzra shpo te bana dh'a /
T02TD1325E:275b-13: aom badzra a'a be she ba shi ku ru ho /
T02TD1325E:275b-14: aom bha ga ba ti sa ma ye shva ri sarba buddha ma te t'a ri ni aa dhi shtha na me ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:275b-15: zhes pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyis dgug pa dang /
T02TD1325E:275b-19: chu dang 'o ma'i rig pas gcig tu byas la tha mi dad par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:275b-20: de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1325E:275b-21: bde ba can gyi zhing khams na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02TD1325E:275b-22: gzhan yang bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i gser gyi bum pa dang /
T02TD1325E:275b-23: rol mo la sogs pas yongs su brgyan pa bkug la /
T02TD1325E:275b-24: mchod de dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02TD1325E:275b-25: bde gshegs tshig mchod bdud rtsi dbang bskur gyis //
T02TD1325E:275b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol //
T02TD1325E:275b-28: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1325E:275b-29: ji ltar che ba'i che sbyin ltar //
T02TD1325E:275b-30: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02TD1325E:275b-31: nam mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02TD1325E:276a-0: da nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dpal he ru ka'i gzugs su sprul pas bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can bum pa rnam pa lnga @276a * //
T02TD1325E:276a-1: yis bdag la dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02TD1325E:276a-2: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1325E:276a-3: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
T02TD1325E:276a-4: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02TD1325E:276a-5: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02TD1325E:276a-6: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD1325E:276a-7: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas ma //
T02TD1325E:276a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum pa'i //
T02TD1325E:276a-9: gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1325E:276a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis dbang bskur ba byas la /
T02TD1325E:276a-11: me tog gur kum gyi char dbab pa dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-13: spyan ma la sogs pas glu blang ba dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-14: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pas bstod pa dang //
T02TD1325E:276a-15: lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-16: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas rjas su gnang bar byas pa'o //
T02TD1325E:276a-17: de nas spyan ma la sogs pas bum pa rnams bzung ste /
T02TD1325E:276a-18: rang gi dkyil 'khor du rab tu bzhugs so //
T02TD1325E:276a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02TD1325E:276a-20: zhes brjod pas rin chen 'byung ldan te /
T02TD1325E:276a-21: gzhan rnams la rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02TD1325E:276a-22: me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-25: don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD1325E:276a-26: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi la'o //
T02TD1325E:276a-27: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma dang gnod mdzes ma gnyis la rin chen dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa gnyis so //
T02TD1325E:276a-29: de'i rjes su mgo po la /
T02TD1325E:276a-33: mgrin pa la aom t'a re'o //
T02TD1325E:276a-34: snying la aom t'a re ni /
T02TD1325E:276a-35: zhes pa 'dis sbyar bas me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar shin tu gsal ba spros pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi nam mkha' la ri mo bris pa lta bu bdag nyid gsal bar bsgoms te /
T02TD1325E:276a-36: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02TD1325E:276a-37: de nas sems can thams cad kyi don ched du 'thor 'thung dang gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1325E:276a-38: gdan la skyil krung bcas la thabs dang shes rab kyi snyoms par 'jug pas yi dam lha'i rnal 'byor du dmigs te /
T02TD1325E:276a-39: chang gi snod las mthe bong dang /
T02TD1325E:276a-40: srin lag gnyis kyis a'a li thigs pa gcig blangs la /
T02TD1325E:276b-0: snod kyi nang @276b du lag pa g-yon pa bzhag la /
T02TD1325E:276b-1: ha yig gis mdog bsgyur bar bya ste /
T02TD1325E:276b-2: lag pa g-yas pa yang de'i steng du bkab la ho: yig gis dri ngan pa bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD1325E:276b-3: de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka gzhag pa'i 'og tu hr'i: yig zhu bas bdud rtsir gyur nas rdzogs par byas te sbyang ngo //
T02TD1325E:276b-4: de nas lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis thigs pa blangs te /
T02TD1325E:276b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyar lhag par mos pas zur gsum pa'i mandala bya ste /
T02TD1325E:276b-6: de'i dkyil 'khor du bam bris la byang sems spro ba'i rim pa ltar rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams te /
T02TD1325E:276b-7: mchod pa la sogs pa'i sngags dang a'a li'i rdzas kyis yang dag par mchod cing bstod do //
T02TD1325E:276b-9: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis lan gsum brjod de /
T02TD1325E:276b-12: lce la sngags kyis 'thor 'thung bya ste /
T02TD1325E:276b-13: gtor ma'i snod nas bcom ldan 'das ma la lan gsum phul la /
T02TD1325E:276b-15: kha dog gi dbye bas gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya ba ni h'um las byung ba'i chos 'byung gi nang du bam las skyes pa'i sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
T02TD1325E:276b-16: yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu /
T02TD1325E:276b-17: de'i steng du ram dmar po yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa steng du 'bar bas mtshan pa /
T02TD1325E:276b-18: de'i steng du aa: las byung ba'i padma'i snod kyi dbus su bh'um a'am dzr'im kh'am h'um l'am m'am p'am t'am p'am zhes pa'i sa bon bcu po de dag go ku da ha na /
T02TD1325E:276b-19: bi ra shu ma mu'i sa bon bcu po de dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa can du rnam par bltas la /
T02TD1325E:276b-20: aom las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa bsgoms te /
T02TD1325E:276b-21: de'i steng du aom dkar po'i kha chod bltas te /
T02TD1325E:276b-23: rdo rje las gzhan pa'i rdzas rnams zhu nas thod par gnas te /
T02TD1325E:276b-24: de nas rdo rjes lan bzhi'am lnga dkrugs pas de yang rnam par zhu nas gnas te /
T02TD1325E:277a-0: de'i rjes su de nyid rnam pa gsum gyis mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su chags nas de dag @277a * //
T02TD1325E:277a-1: gis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug nas rab tu zhugs te /
T02TD1325E:277a-2: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir gyur te /
T02TD1325E:277a-5: aom a'a: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na aa mri te h'um zhes pa'i sngags 'dis rdo rje dang ldan pa'i phyag gis gtor snod la reg ste /
T02TD1325E:277a-6: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i lha mo'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i lha rnams la bstan par byas la /
T02TD1325E:277a-7: aom pra ba ra satk'a ram aargham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:277a-8: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis dung gi phyag rgyas mdun du mchod yon dbul lo //
T02TD1325E:277a-9: aom pra ba ra satk'a ram p'a tya pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:277a-10: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis skam pa'i phyag rgyas zhabs gnyis la zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02TD1325E:277a-11: gong bzhin du bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho gas gtor ma nye bar bya ba la sogs pa bdud rtsir byas la /
T02TD1325E:277a-12: aom badzra t'a re bha ya ha re bi gh'am sh'anti ka re /
T02TD1325E:277a-13: pra kri te bha sv'a re /
T02TD1325E:277a-14: sarba du shda s'a dha ni ai mem ba lim pra t'i tstsha mam sarba sa tv'a n'a nytsa ra ksham ku ru /
T02TD1325E:277a-18: ra ksha ra ksha mam sarba tv'am shtsa h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:277a-19: zhes pas gtor ma nye bar bshams te /
T02TD1325E:277a-20: h'um dkar po yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i ljags rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi sbu gu nas 'phru tsam gyis gsol bas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag bo 'khor dang bcas pa tshim par bsam mo //
T02TD1325E:277a-21: de nas kha bshal ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD1325E:277a-22: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD1325E:277a-24: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha /
T02TD1325E:277a-26: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1325E:277a-27: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1325E:277a-28: aa nu ra kto me bha ba /
T02TD1325E:277a-29: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha sarba ka rma su tsa me /
T02TD1325E:277a-31: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga w'am sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02TD1325E:277a-32: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva aa: zhes brjod pas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02TD1325E:277a-33: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02TD1325E:277a-34: de rnams gsung yang tshad ma mchog dang ni //
T02TD1325E:277a-35: bden pa des ni lha mo 'di rnams kyis //
T02TD1325E:277a-36: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur shog / srid dang zhi la chags kun rtogs pa'i rlabs bcom zhing //
T02TD1325E:277a-37: dngos kun ma lus rang bzhin nam mkha' ltar gzigs pa //
T02TD1325E:277a-38: brtse ba'i chu yis rab rgyas thugs ni rgya mtsho'i mchog / lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu brtser mdzad gsol //
T02TD1325E:277b-0: zhes @277b pa 'di rnams brjod la bzod par gsal to //
T02TD1325E:277b-1: aom khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD1325E:277b-2: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1325E:277b-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02TD1325E:277b-4: slar yang sems can don la byon //
T02TD1325E:277b-5: zhes pa 'dis g-yas pa'i rgyab tu g-yon pa'i mthe bong dang /
T02TD1325E:277b-6: srin lag gis se gol lan gsum brdabs pa'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-7: de nas lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma btang ngo //
T02TD1325E:277b-8: gtor ma dbul ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-9: de'i rjes su gzhan yang bza' ba'i cho ga ni /
T02TD1325E:277b-11: lto ba'i me thab kyi steng du me'i sa bon las byung ba'i me la bza' ba la sogs pa'i rdzas lag pa'i gzar bus sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-12: h'um dkar po las byung ba'i ljags rdo rje nas 'bru tsam gyis 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i sgrol ma'i gzugs kyi sbyar bas dgang blugs kyis sbyin sreg dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-13: mgrin pa'i lam de dag thams cad lto ba'i thab la rab tu zhugs te /
T02TD1325E:277b-14: lto ba'i mes zhu nas bdud rtsir gyur te /
T02TD1325E:277b-15: bdud rtsi des bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor dang bcas pa tshim par gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD1325E:277b-16: khyad par nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-17: de nas bdud rtsi myangs nas lha'i bdag nyid can rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa sbro bsdu sdon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1325E:277b-18: bsgoms pas skyon myur ba dang /
T02TD1325E:277b-22: rtog pa dan pa spangs la bzlas pa ni /
T02TD1325E:277b-23: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:277b-24: zhes brjod pa ni rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i sngags 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyor bas kha nas 'thon te /
T02TD1325E:277b-25: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi tshogs dang /
T02TD1325E:277b-32: sgyu rtsal gyi yon tan la sogs pa'i nus pa blangs nas /
T02TD1325E:277b-33: yang snying ga'i zla ba la rab tu zhugs te /
T02TD1325E:277b-34: rang dang gzhan thams cad kyis mi shes pa'i mun pa bsreg pa'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya ste sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-35: thun gsum du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:277b-36: skyon langs te rtag tu lha'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-0: gang gi tshe sngags bzlas pa las ldang bar 'dod pa de'i tshe sngags kyi phreng ba rang gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim @278a * //
T02TD1325E:278a-2: mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas smon lam btab ste /
T02TD1325E:278a-3: bsod nams yongs su bsngos la yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD1325E:278a-4: de nas lha mo'i nga rgyal bya ste /
T02TD1325E:278a-5: chos thams cad kyang de'i gzugs su bltas la /
T02TD1325E:278a-6: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-7: nyal ba'i dus su yang bla ma dang /
T02TD1325E:278a-9: sems can de rnams sangs rgyas su bltas la yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1325E:278a-10: brkyang phyag gis 'dud pa'i bsam pas seng ge'i nyal stabs kyi tshul gyis 'od gsal du snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bsam pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-11: de nas tho rangs kyi thun la lha mo'i glu'i sgras rab tu bskul bas langs te /
T02TD1325E:278a-12: thams cad snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-13: 'di ni sngags mchog dam pa yin //
T02TD1325E:278a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'i //
T02TD1325E:278a-15: bklags pas 'grub byed bzang po ni //
T02TD1325E:278a-16: rdo rje gur las gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-17: rdo rje sgrol ma'i bdag rnal 'byor //
T02TD1325E:278a-18: sems can don kun mthar phyin pa //
T02TD1325E:278a-19: rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1325E:278a-20: khams gsum 'di ni bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1325E:278a-21: de nas gzhan yang gzungs sngags 'di //
T02TD1325E:278a-22: aom na ma: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1325E:278a-25: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1325E:278a-27: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sarba dushta pra dushtam ma ma kri ta /
T02TD1325E:278a-28: dzam bha ya dzam bha ya /
T02TD1325E:278a-29: stam bha ya stam bha ya /
T02TD1325E:278a-33: h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat sarba dushta stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:278a-34: sngags 'di'i nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278a-35: sngags 'dis gos kyi thu ba la lan bdun mngon par bzlas la mdud pa byas te nags 'thug por phyin kyang gang gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1325E:278a-44: ba men la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di'i mtshan dran pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:278a-45: de nas me tog sgrol ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:278a-46: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:278a-47: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis autpala dmar po brgya rtsa brgyad la sbyin sreg byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:278a-48: spos kyi sgrol ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:278b-0: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsa la @278b pra tsa la sh'i ghram g'a mi ni de ba datta autstsha ta ya h'um /
T02TD1325E:278b-1: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis bya rog gi sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dgra po'i sgo la sbas pas zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:278b-2: mar me'i sgrol ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:278b-3: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka aa bhi dha nam ku mam ram mi hyam bi bha he na ya s+ya si tva pra yatstsha tu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:278b-4: ma da na dang gtum pa'i sa bon dang /
T02TD1325E:278b-5: de bzhin smyon ba'i 'bras bu dang //
T02TD1325E:278b-6: mya ngan med pa'i me tog la //
T02TD1325E:278b-7: stong phrag lnga ru sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD1325E:278b-8: bu ram sbrang rtsi mar sbyin sreg / bu mo bsgrubs la khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1325E:278b-9: de nas rnal 'byor zhag bdun bar //
T02TD1325E:278b-12: dri'i sgrol ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:278b-13: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka sva sth'a n'a da ma ma ra sha a'a karsha ya dza: zhes pa'i sngags 'dis kham khri'i tsher ma dang /
T02TD1325E:278b-14: rang byung gi me tog sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1325E:278b-15: sngags 'dis rgyal po'i bu mo yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:278b-16: rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:278b-17: ra dza sa la'i ras la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa bris la /
T02TD1325E:278b-18: de'i mdun du mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD1325E:278b-19: gtsang zhing gtsang ma las byung ba'i //
T02TD1325E:278b-20: lha yi me tog dge rnams ni //
T02TD1325E:278b-21: gus pas bdag ni 'bul lags na //
T02TD1325E:278b-22: bzhes te bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1325E:278b-23: spos bzangs dri dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1325E:278b-25: gus pas bdag ni 'bul lags na //
T02TD1325E:278b-26: bzhes te bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1325E:278b-27: gtsang zhing dge la mun pa sel //
T02TD1325E:278b-29: bdag gis gus pas 'bul lags na //
T02TD1325E:278b-30: bzhes nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1325E:278b-31: gtsang zhing gtsang ma las byung ba'i //
T02TD1325E:278b-32: dge ba li lha rdzas dri rnams 'di //
T02TD1325E:278b-33: bdag gis gus pas 'bul lags na //
T02TD1325E:278b-34: bzhes nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1325E:278b-35: zhes brjod pas bsgom pa dang ldan pas sngags brjod pa ni /
T02TD1325E:278b-36: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re ma ma sv'a ba nam aa mu ki darsha ya h'um phat /
T02TD1325E:278b-37: ces stong phrag lnga bzlas la zhags pas ske la bcings pa dang lcags kyus snying la phug ste /
T02TD1325E:279a-0: autpala de nyid kyis rkang pa gnyis bcings la @279a * //
T02TD1325E:279a-2: rkang 'og bsgrub bya bsams nas su //
T02TD1325E:279a-3: khol mo lta bur longs spyad bya //
T02TD1325E:279a-5: rdo rje zhags pa'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:279a-6: sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis srin lag la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la bdag gi mig gnyis la phyis te /
T02TD1325E:279a-7: de nas rgyal po'i drung du phyin na rgyal po de slob ma lta bur 'gyur pas dad par byed pa dang /
T02TD1325E:279a-8: ngan du mi smra bar sbyin pa ster te /
T02TD1325E:279a-10: khol po lta bur 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD1325E:279a-12: 'di ni yid ches par mthong bar gyur pas ngo mtshar che'o //
T02TD1325E:279a-13: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:279a-14: sgrol ma'i gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD1325E:279a-15: mgo gnyis pa'i sbrul gyi thal ba byas la /
T02TD1325E:279a-17: shing aa rka'i bal gyis sdong bu byas la /
T02TD1325E:279a-18: de las mar me byas la sna tsha byas te /
T02TD1325E:279a-19: snag tsha de rdo rje nyi ma dang /
T02TD1325E:279a-20: rdo rje chos rnams kyis bsres la mnyes te rta mchog gi spos btang ngo //
T02TD1325E:279a-21: thal pa de dang bcas pas mig gnyis la byugs la /
T02TD1325E:279a-22: rdo rje'i mig des gang mthong ba de la gal te padma gar gyi dbang phyug 'dzag par ma gyur na /
T02TD1325E:279a-23: de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma yin zhing /
T02TD1325E:279a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag gis gsad par 'gyur ro zhes so //
T02TD1325E:279a-25: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i rab sbyor gnyis pa ni /
T02TD1325E:279a-26: bu chung so ma skyes pa'i lce blangs la /
T02TD1325E:279a-27: sgrol ma'i gzung sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
T02TD1325E:279a-28: sdo bhringga r'a dza dang gi wang dang gnyis lhan cig tu byas te /
T02TD1325E:279a-29: dpral bar thig le byas na /
T02TD1325E:279a-30: gang dang gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:279a-31: rdo rje dril bu'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:279a-32: lto ba'i srin bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
T02TD1325E:279a-33: rdo rje chos dang lhan cig byas te /
T02TD1325E:279a-34: tam pu la dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1325E:279a-35: rnal 'byor mchog de mid na mi spong zhing /
T02TD1325E:279a-36: gzhan la yang mi chags te gzhan du yang mi 'gro zhing rang gi bdag po yang spangs te /
T02TD1325E:279a-37: rang gi chung ma lta bur spyad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:279a-38: rdo rje dril bu ma'i rab sbyor gnyis pa ni /
T02TD1325E:279a-39: bdag nyid sgrol mar bsgoms la tshil chen gyi byug pa bya zhing sngags khri tsho gcig bzlas pa byas la /
T02TD1325E:279b-0: bzlas pa'i rjes su @279b 'bras mkhar ma can gyi 'dag pas dri mas thon la /
T02TD1325E:279b-1: des snum khur du byas la /
T02TD1325E:279b-2: gang la sbyin pa de 'tshog chas lnga dang bral yang mi spong ngo //
T02TD1325E:279b-3: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rab sbyor ni /
T02TD1325E:279b-4: zla ba gzas zin pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs sngags bzlas shing brtan par bya ste /
T02TD1325E:279b-5: de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02TD1325E:279b-6: dung dkar gyi thal ba dang bsres te rab tu mos nas 'tshog chas lnga dang bral yang mi spong ngo //
T02TD1325E:279b-7: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rab sbyor gnyis pa ni /
T02TD1325E:279b-8: sgrol ma'i gzungs sngags kyis shing thog ma ngan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD1325E:279b-9: rdog ma'i 'bru dang rta mgrin gnyis lhan cig tu byas nas gang la byugs pa de dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:279b-10: snod mdzes ma'i rab sbyor ni aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka sya bandha na mukti ku ru mu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1325E:279b-11: shing aarka'i 'o ma la bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris la /
T02TD1325E:279b-12: ku li rta'i tshang la spas na /
T02TD1325E:279b-13: bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1325E:279b-14: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs 'di //
T02TD1325E:279b-15: bdag gis byas pa'i bsod nams gang //
T02TD1325E:279b-17: bde gshegs go 'phang thob par shog / rdo rje gur las byung ba gru ba thob chen po sna tshogs dmar po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1325E:279b-19: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po d'a na sh'i las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
